items: Developed a service to automatically perform a set of unit tests daily on a product in development.
Incorporated scripts using Python and PowerShell to aggregate XML test results.
Utilized Jenkins to automate loading the latest build code and test files.
Explored ways to visualize and send a daily report of test results to team members.
Assisted in developing the front end of a mobile app for iOS/Android using Dart and Flutter.
Worked with Google Firebase to manage data across multiple platforms.
Collaborated with team members using Git.
Utilized Android Studio to visualize the application.
